import React from 'react'; import './RoomPage.css'; import useRoomPage from '../../hooks/useRoomPage'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const RoomPage = () => { const { room, roomId, userEmail, loading, extracting, showModal, setShowModal, inputMethod, setInputMethod, formData, handleInputChange, handleAddProfile, handleDeleteProfile, handleExtractResearch, } = useRoomPage(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const profiles = room.profiles || {}; return (

Room: {room.RoomID}

Created by: {room.creatorID}

{Object.values(profiles).length > 0 ? ( <>
{Object.values(profiles).map((profile, idx) => (

{profile.name}

{profile.email} {room.creatorID === userEmail && ( )}

{profile.description || 'No description provided'}

))}
) : (
📂

No profiles yet

Add the first profile to get started

)}
{showModal && (

Add Researcher Profile
